data.title: Justice. Jacques Doillon targeted by several new complaints for sexual violence
data.meta_description: Three new complaints target the filmmaker, who was taken into custody on Monday after a first complaint filed by Judith Godrèche. For his part, director Benoît
data.text:
France Bleu

Director Jacques Doillon targeted by three new complaints for rape and attempted rape - France Bleu

Jacques Doillon is the target of three new complaints, Franceinfo learned on Thursday. Already implicated by actress Judith Godrèche, the 80-year-old director was taken into custody at the beginning of the week before being released without prosecution at this stage.

2 months ago

Read Full Article

estrepublicain.fr

Justice. Jacques Doillon targeted by several new complaints for sexual violence

Three new complaints target the filmmaker, who was taken into custody on Monday after a first complaint filed by Judith Godrèche. For his part, director Benoît Jacquot was indicted for rape on Wednesday evening.

2 months ago·Nancy, France
